org.judal.storage.table.impl

Class AbstractSingleColumnRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.storage.table.impl.AbstractSingleColumnRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Stored, Record, SingleColumnRecord
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleObjectColumnRecord

    public abstract class AbstractSingleColumnRecord
extends Object
implements SingleColumnRecord
    Base class for Record implementations that hold only a single column
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • columns

        public ColumnDef[] columns()
        Description copied from interface: Record

        Columns of the Record as given by a ViewDef, TableDef or FetchGroup.

        records of subclass MapRecord may contain more columns than the ones returned by calling this method in order to accommodate growing column families in column-oriented databases.
        Specified by:
        columns in interface Record
        Returns:
        ColumnDef[]
